turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to track my order. I have the order number, but I can't find the tracking information anywhere.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. Please provide your order number, and I will look up the tracking information for you. Also, can you confirm the email address associated with the order?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, the order number is 12345. The email is [user's email]. Seriously though, I looked everywhere on the site and in my emails, and it's just not there. I'm getting a little frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the inconvenience. I've located your order with the provided details. It appears the tracking information is: [Tracking Number]. You can track your shipment at [Tracking Link]. Is there anything else I can help you with? The estimated delivery date is [Date].

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Perfect, thank you! That's exactly what I needed. One more question. The order was supposed to be a gift, and the recipient has already received it. I am not sure that the recipient wants to keep the item. What's your return policy, just in case?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Our return policy allows for returns within 30 days of the delivery date. The item must be in its original condition and packaging. To initiate a return, please go to [Link to Return Portal] and follow the instructions. You will need your order number and the email address used for the purchase. Please note that the shipping cost is non-refundable. Are there any further questions?
